definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Further Practice for Pairs ·Add a third speaker and create your own lines.
sentences.chinese: 加進圈外人，創作你們自己的對話。

sentences.english: You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你們務必不要讓孩子接觸危險物品。

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你們真是忙得連個下午都抽不出來了。

sentences.english: I authorize you to hit 'em a tremendous whack.
sentences.chinese: 我授權你們，向他們放一排狠毒的排槍。

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你們自己證明，是殺害先知者的子孫了。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林後二8所以我勸你們，要向他證實你們的愛。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林後二8所以我勸你們，要向他證實你們的愛。
你們大部分人採訪報道過我。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我願向你們盛情的接待與款待表示衷心的感謝。
歡迎你們來到雲林機場。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界衛生日，我祝願你們大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你們每天都做家庭作業嗎？

sentences.english: And it’s goingto be up to you to make an even bigger difference over the next 40years.
sentences.chinese: 未來40年更大的改變也將取決於你們。

sentences.english: Yet the timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness
sentences.chinese: 然而你們心中的無限，意識到生命的無限。

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你們連一根頭髮，也必不損壞。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
